txt.en: You take the antlers as proof of your victory
The villagers of Arhaim tell the legend of a massive black hart that protects the deer within Duskenvale. Draw his ire at your own risk!

You present the massive antlers to Goslim. His jaw goes slack.\n\n'You... you killed Skadhurn? The storytellers must know of this! They will tell the tale of your victory over that massive beast for years to come!'
Somewhere in Duskenvale, the massive hart known as Skadhurn protects his herd.\n\nYou should find and defeat Skadhurn.
Goslim can be found in the village Arhaim in Duskenvale.\n\nYou should bring the antlers to Goslim.

'As you are preparing to enter the wilds seeking the deer, you should hear of their protector. The story of a massive black hart known as Skadhurn has been passed down for what seems like many generations. He guards his herd jealously, and is known to gore any who would dare hunt them on his massive crown of antlers. I have never seen the beast myself, but the elders swear he is out there. Hunt him at your own risk!'
